p: De novo lipogenesis in epididymal adipocytes was estimated by incubating isolated cells (1 × 10 6 cells/mL) in Krebs/Ringer/phosphate buffer (pH 7.4) containing BSA (1%), glucose (2 mM), and [1- 14C]-acetate (1 mM, 1850 Bq/tube or well) for 2 h at 37°C in a water bath and processed as described previously ( 32, 33). Results are expressed as nmol of acetate incorporated into TAG/1 × 10 6 cells/h.
